typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		product as (id as string, Name as string),
		components as (id as string, name as string, isDeprecated as string, type as string, dependencies as (type as string, name as string, version as string)[])[],
		{authoritative-branch} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	singleDocument: true,
	unquotedColumnNames: true,
	backslashEscape: true) ~> source1
source(output(
		product as (id as string, Name as string),
		components as (id as string, name as string, isDeprecated as string, type as string, dependencies as (type as string, name as string, version as string)[])[],
		{authoritative-branch} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
